headers.subject: [tosdr:2055] [bad] Microsoft may remotely disabled software you are not licensed to use.

html:
Applies to outlook.com skydrive.com, live.com, account.live.com, profile.microsoft.com, msn.com, bing.com, office.com, Windows Photo Gallery, Windows Movie Maker, Microsoft Mail, Windows Live Writer and "other Microsoft Services" that link to these terms (oddly enough Microsoft.com has a different ToS).



4.4. What happens if my services are canceled or terminated? If your services are canceled or terminated (whether by you or us), your right to use the services stops immediately and your license to use our software ends. You must then uninstall the software, or, alternatively, we may disable it. If your services are canceled or terminated, we may permanently delete your content from our servers and we have no obligation to return content to you.

 

From <http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-live/microsoft-services-agreement> 

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: [bad] Microsoft may remotely disabled software you are not licensed to use.
text:
Applies to outlook.com skydrive.com, live.com, account.live.com, 
profile.microsoft.com, msn.com, bing.com, office.com, Windows Photo 
Gallery, Windows Movie Maker, Microsoft Mail, Windows Live Writer and 
"other Microsoft Services" that link to these terms (oddly enough 
Microsoft.com has a different ToS).


4.4. What happens if my services are canceled or terminated? If your 
> services are canceled or terminated (whether by you or us), your right to 
> use the services stops immediately and your license to use our software 
> ends. You must then uninstall the software, or, alternatively, we may 
> disable it. If your services are canceled or terminated, we may 
> permanently delete your content from our servers and we have no obligation 
> to return content to you.
>
>  
>
> From <
> http://windows.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-live/microsoft-services-agreement
> > 
>

-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
